title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
description: The latest in the iconic Call of Duty franchise, offering high-octane first-person combat, cinematic storytelling, and expansive multiplayer modes.

title: Battlefield 2042
description: A massive-scale, futuristic warfare FPS with large maps, destructible environments, and dynamic weather systems.

title: Counter-Strike 2
description: The evolution of the world’s most competitive tactical shooter, featuring updated Source 2 engine visuals and physics.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world action RPG set in a futuristic city full of life, crime, and corporate warfare, where your choices shape the story.

title: DOOM Eternal
description: An intense, fast-paced shooter that puts players in control of the Doom Slayer to battle demons across hellish landscapes.

title: Apex Legends
description: A hero-based battle royale shooter set in the Titanfall universe, featuring unique characters, teamwork, and fluid movement.

title: Rainbow Six Siege
description: A tactical shooter focusing on strategy, team play, and destruction-based gameplay where every wall can be a potential breach point.

title: Escape from Tarkov
description: A hardcore and realistic online FPS with survival elements and deep weapon customization set in a fictional war-torn region.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An epic Western tale of loyalty and survival with stunning visuals and one of the richest open worlds ever made.

title: Elden Ring
description: A vast open-world RPG from the creators of Dark Souls, blending exploration, combat, and lore in a mysterious fantasy world.

title: Overwatch 2
description: A vibrant team-based shooter featuring diverse heroes with unique abilities and roles, emphasizing teamwork and objectives.

title: Halo Infinite
description: The legendary Halo franchise returns with a new open-world campaign and competitive multiplayer modes built on next-gen visuals.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: An award-winning open-world RPG following Geralt of Rivia’s monster-hunting journey in a beautifully crafted medieval world.

title: Far Cry 6
description: A first-person shooter set in a tropical dictatorship, featuring an expansive open world filled with guerrilla warfare and chaos.

title: Valorant
description: A competitive 5v5 tactical shooter combining precise gunplay with unique agent abilities, demanding both aim and strategy.

title: Forza Horizon 5
description: Forza Horizon 5 is a racing video game set in an open world environment based in a fictional representation of Mexico.
